forgotPassword.title: Forgot password
forgotPassword.description: As specified in the security section of the app, your password is used for encryption and decryption and only you have access to it. Therefore, we can't restore your account without the password. You can register again by entering your email below so we can delete your account and all your files.

advice1.title: What data can be edited?
advice1.description: For strict security reasons and to protect your data at Internxt we do not allow the data of a user account such as email to be modified.

advice2.title: Security account
advice2.description: Your files are encrypted before leaving your device, so only you can access your files, no tricks, no hidden things, just privacy, that’s Internxt.

advice1.title: 修改密码
advice1.description: Changing your password will sign you out from all your devices. The password introduced will be needed for logging in again.

advice2.title: What should you keep in mind so that your password is secure?

advice3.title: New encryption key
advice3.description: By changing your password, all your files will be un-encrypted with your old password, and then re-encrypted using your new password, and thus you won't lose access to them! 此操作不能被撤销

advice4.title: What data can be edited?
advice4.description: For strict security reasons and to protect your data at Internxt we do not allow the data of a user account such as email to be modified.

changePassword.title: 修改密码
changePassword.description: 记住，如果你忘记了你的密码，你将失去对所有文件的访问权限。我们建议使用一个密码管理器。

2FA.title: 双因素认证(2FA)
2FA.description: 双因素认证提供了一个额外的安全性，在登录时需要验证。除了你的密码外，你还需要一个生成的代码。

download.title: 下载Authy
download.description: 我们推荐使用Authy，但你也可以用你选择的另一个2FA应用程序设置2FA。

qr.title: 用2FA应用程序扫描二维码
qr.description: 或者，如果你不能扫描二维码，请将此代码输入应用程序中

backup-key.title: 保存恢复密钥
backup-key.description: 复制这个代码并妥善保管，万一你的设备丢失，你将会需要它。

disable.title: Disable Two-Factor Authentication
disable.description: To disable Two-Factor Authentication, type the code generated by the app into the input below.

errors.incorrect: The code is not correct, try again
errors.notVerified: We could not verify your code

backupKey.title: 恢复密钥
backupKey.description: If you forget your password, you may use a unique backup key to recover your account. Never share this code with anyone.
backupKey.error: We could not generate your backup key

faq1.title: 为什么如果我失去了密码，就会失去我的文件？
faq1.description:
你的密码是访问你的账户的唯一途径，Internxt团队不能访问你的账户或更改你的密码。这是为了防止任何人进入你的账户或窃取你的数据。

其中，你的密码被用于加密过程，所以甚至连Internxt都没有机会接触到它。每次你登录时，你需要你的密码来解密你的文件，所以我们确保只有你有这个钥匙。

faq2.title: 我怎样才能保证我的凭证安全？
faq2.description: 我们建议使用一个密码管理器来保持你的凭证安全，不仅是为了访问Internxt，也是为了在浏览时保护自己。

faq3.title: 我可以用恢复密钥恢复我的账户吗？
faq3.description: 如果你把你的恢复密钥放在一个安全的地方，你可以按照你点击 "忘记密码 "后收到的电子邮件中的步骤恢复你的账户。

faq4.title: 如果我修改密码，会不会丢失我的文件？
faq4.description: 不，由于你已经登录，你可以修改你的密码而不会丢失你账户中的任何文件。请确保你选择了一个强大的密码。
